title: Husband From Hell Returns! Jenelle Evans’ Ex Courtland To Be Released From Prison

organizations.name: mtv reality stars’ wild ink  evans

text:
Husband From Hell Returns! Jenelle Evans’ Ex Courtland To Be Released From Prison Will the felon try to win the ‘Teen Mom 2’ star back? Posted on Mar 10, 2017 @ 16:02PM 
Jenelle Evans ’ fiancé David Eason may have some competition! The Teen Mom 2 star’s ex-husband Courtland Rogers is only days away from being released from prison, RadarOnline.com can exclusively reveal. 
An officer from Tabor City Correctional Institution in North Carolina exclusively told Radar that Rogers’ release date from prison is March 18, 2017. 
Courtland, 31, was sentenced to three years in prison for possession of heroin and for being a habitual felon after he was arrested on November 20, 2015. 
The officer told Radar of his reduced sentence, “There is an advanced supervised release program. They have to meet a certain criteria and not get certain infractions and be in classes to have a reduced sentence.” 
PHOTOS: Teen Moms With Tats! See The MTV Reality Stars’ Wild Ink 
Evans and Rogers were married for 18 months after tying the knot in 2012. 
The former couple was arrested in April 2013 for possession of heroin and assault for a domestic dispute. 
Evans became pregnant with Rogers’ child, but aborted the baby because of their toxic relationship. 
The MTV star is currently engaged to Eason . They welcomed daughter Ensley in January. She’s also mother to sons Jace , from a previous relationship with Andrew Lewis and Kaiser , from her romance with Nathan Griffith . 
In 2014, Radar revealed a video of Rogers injecting himself with a hit of heroin. 
“I did relapse, see all my track marks,” he said in the footage , which he provided. 
Do you think Rogers will try to win Evans back when he’s released from prison? Tell us in the comments!
